Where We Come From: About our Founder, Gary Gault
​
/$
$
Gary Gault envisioned a bar where people from all walks of life could gather to share some drinks and laughs with family and friends while feeling like they were right at home, in their own family room. With a heart of gold and a head full of determination, he opened The Salty Goat Saloon in Summer of 2012 and he brought his vision to life. He spent the next 5 years making the Salty Goat Panama City Beach's go to spot for locals, bikers, and military personnel. Unfortunately, we live in an unfair and sometimes cruel world. Gary was diagnosed with AML (Acute Myeloid Leukemia) in November of 2017 and even though he fought hard, he was taken to be with the Lord on December 21, 2017. Gary will forever be the face of The Salty Goat Saloon and his legacy will live on in the hearts of all who knew and loved him.
​
Below is a tribute to Gary featured in Full Throttle Magazine, written by one of his very good friends, Ron Thompson.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
/$
/$

ABOUT US
The Salty Goat Saloon, established in 2012, is a locally owned and operated bar and grill, that is open throughout the year. We typically have live music 7 nights a week from local or traveling artists. The Goat is one of Panama City Beach's favorite local spots to go for food, fun, live music, cold beer and cocktails! Our patio with its Gulf View is the perfect place to enjoy a PCB sunset.
​
Smell the Salt, Savor the Moment, See you at The Goat!
​
Open Everyday 11AM-2AM
​
/$
$
/$
$
